message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exclusive opportunity that we believe would greatly benefit you. We're offering it to you for $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the exclusivity of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would you be able to accommodate this budget?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To meet your needs, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $8,800 for the product. I hope this offer is more in line with what you were hoping for.
